examples: Silene x intermedia in Atlas Kent Flora: 34 (1982)
notes: Keeper of Natural History at Maidstone Museum, 1958-1993, former President and Honorary member of the Kent Field Club
source: Letter from C.A. Stace 4 Dec. 1985 from D.H. Kent 1990; Obituary in: Kent Field Club, https://www.kentfieldclub.org.uk/news/obituaries/eric-george-philp (via Clive A. Stace; U.K.)
